name: SWEET DEATH
description:
CONTROLS - WASD or Arrow Keys

Best played in fullscreen.

This game was made for MooMooJam with the theme of "You are your own enemy."

I set a goal of my own to make the base gameplay in under 25 events. There are 24 events. So, a win for myself.

In this case, if you eat the sweet snacks you will eventually die.

I made this game in 4 hours because I did join the game until there was only 1 day and 6 hours left and the next day was not available for game dev. Thus I did what I could with the small amount of time I had. 

This game is meant to be funny and lighthearted. Please have a sense of humor with the character death sequence.

I used Construct 3, Beepbox, and My mouth to make the assets in this game.

Have fun. Eat cake!
